resources.string: Set sd cache size, must be between 128 and 4096
Sensitivity and noise must be set between 20 and 75, where 20 means max sensibility and 75 the min. Recommended: 25 for sensibility and 50 for noise.
Haptic feedback is the vibrate feedback issued by pressing the softkeys.
SD Cache improves the speed of your SD card. The value must be between 128 and 4096. Reccomended value: 2048.
Disable battery led when a USB cable is connected. When unchecked remove and reinsert USB cable to enable battery led.
Required to fix sms and call LEDs (service: drain a little more battery than normal).
Use softkey led as new sms notification led (service: drain more battery than normal).
